summary: A comprehensive test suite that validates the behavior of AWS Simple Workflow Service (SWF) client operations through boto3, using Moto to mock AWS services and Freezegun for time control. It covers activity tasks, activity types, decision tasks, domains, workflow executions, workflow types, and timeout handling, ensuring correct responses, state transitions, and error handling across the SWF API.
business_intent: Guarantee reliable integration with AWS SWF by automatically verifying that all client-side operations perform as expected, handle edge cases gracefully, and conform to business workflow requirements before deployment.
